template<class T>
FdoPtr< T >::FdoPtr (  const FdoPtr< T > &  lp  )  throw () [inline]
 

FdoPtr copy constructor. Wraps a new FdoPtr around the object referenced by lp.

Parameters:
lp Input the FdoPtr to copy from.
Returns:
Returns a FdoPtr
Note:
This operator adds a reference on the object.
